page.title: 15 BRERETON GIRL'S POSSESSIONS
page.content:
CLOTHES: 18 pairs socks, 5 vests, 15 pairs knickers, 6 pairs tights, 5 nighties, 1 pair pyjamas, 11 T-shirts 4 blouses,1 pair jeans, 5 pair slacks 5 pair shorts, 1 string vest, 9 skirts, 2 swimming suits,2 dressing gowns, 12 dresses, 8 jumpers, 4 slips, 4 pairs shoes, 3 coats, 8 cardigans.
BELONGINGS: 5 Teddy bears, 11 Board Games, Record Player, 100 Records, Cassette Player, Personal Cassette Player, 10 Tapes, Felt-tip Pens, 18 Pencil Sharpeners, 2 Bicycles, B.M.X.Helmet, 3 Jigsaws, Lego, Books, 5 Tins Talc, 4 Money Boxes, 5 Purses, 3 Jewelry Boxes, 4 Necklaces, 2 Bracelets, 2 Pairs Earrings,
FURNISHINGS: Bed, Chair-bed, Wardrobe, Desk, Folding chair, Quilt, Table
